website_summaries.verdict: Natural ingredients create a youthful glow that minimizes the look of wrinkles.
pros: Provides a flushed look while also reversing the signs of aging

Natural age-defying ingredients like pomegranate, white tea, red tea, and sea kelp, plus vitamins C and E protect skin against free radical damage.Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic so it's safe for sensitive skin too
cons: The compact size is smaller than comparable brands and difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: This the best blush I have purchased on-line
customer_reviews.text: This the best blush I have purchased on-line. I've had to return all others because the color never matches what is advertised. Usually the color ends up lighter than I expected because of the photo that is shown. This blush is awesome. I love the way it goes on and the way it looks when applied. I highly recommend this blush! It's a 5 star all the way! Thanks!!!! Great Product! No BS!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Slabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Non-Toxic Make-up
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Mineral Fusion Blush. I now have 3 different colors. I use them as eyeshadow too, they work better for eyeshadow than any others ice tried. I have severe Multiple Chemical Sensitivity and I tolerate Mineral Fusion very well. So far it's the best safe non-toxic make-up I've used, most are very hard to apply and don't go on evenly. This stuff is wonderful. I highly recommend it to anyone who has Multiple Chemical Sensitivity, Sensitive Skin or Allergies.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but good
customer_reviews.text: If I had originally seen this at a store, I would not have bought it. it is TINY! I wouldn't have wanted to spend so much on so little. But, surprisingly a little goes a long way! I am truly impressed with this blush. It is very good quality and it stays on. I will continue to buy it....whenever this little gem does finally run out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: or it’s to dark and looks like you have uneven skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I’m really picky about my blush colors. Sometimes the colors are to bright and orangey, or it’s to dark and looks like you have uneven skin tone. This was perfect color! I love this color for my eyeshadow or use it for my blush. Never again using anything else for my blush.
customer_reviews.author: Amberh80

customer_reviews.title: I like it. But it does cause my cheeks to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But it does cause my cheeks to itch a bit not too long after putting it on. However, I don't wear make up but once in a blue moon.. so, it probably is just me and my skin not being used to make up.
customer_reviews.author: avid_amazoneer

customer_reviews.title: The size is so small for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color, but the size is so tiny for the price you pay, (child size) I would love to buy it again if they lowered the price, but because if the small size and the price I will continue to look at others.
customer_reviews.author: Kara David

customer_reviews.title: So small, picture make it look like an average compact size & it's very tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I got this!! The box it came in was so small, then when you see the actual compact there is hardly any blush at all. The compact has about a 50 cent coin size & quantity of blush. The blush flips open to even more space underneath where there is a small blush brush & mirror on the underside of makeup. There is still space under the compact. It was just disappointing that there was so very little blush in the tiny compact. I returned it. I would have been happy with it if it was a decent amount of blush.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Coast Gal

customer_reviews.title: I love this blush
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush. It is a rosy coral, but not too orange. The blush amount/container was a little smaller than I expected, however.
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: buildable natural color but tiny size
customer_reviews.text: "Airy" is a cice color, Mineral Fusion uses nice ingredients. Tiny amount for the price, though. I wont subtract a star for that, but people should know that you will get a tiny disk of blush, with no compact/mirror/or brush. It is just a small pot of color. I think the size is fine overall, since make up shouldn't be kept forever, and there is only so much blush one can use at a time. This color is nice on my light toned skin. It would build color easily. I say I have to go with a minimal amount in my swipe, but someone else could benefit from a few swipes and still look like a natural flush.
customer_reviews.author: Precise DisarrayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fine Cosmetic, Wrong Color For Me
customer_reviews.text: This Mineral Fusion Blush , in "Creation" , may come in a smaller size, but it's a fine cosmetic. With a good brush, it's creamy consistency is easy to build the sheerness or intensity of color you like. Unfortunately, it isn't the color I was looking for. I read ALOT of reviews which called "Creation" a plum shade, which I was looking for. It is a bricky- peach shade, which to me, doesn't compliment my "summer " color, light complexion. Sometimes it's hard to buy cosmetics online, I hope someday all the colors on our computers are lifelike !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is tiny (size). No eye or skin irritation ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is tiny (size). No eye or skin irritation and it's smooth and stays put. The first cosmetic that I have used that doesn't make my eyes itch and burn. I forget I'm wearing it. Prior to this, I gave up and hadn't worn makeup for about 6 years. When I did for special occasions, it would drive me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but it's really tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it except the size. It's just slightly larger than a quarter. I was very surprised when I open the package. I've never owned a blush so small.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty, just a little dark and more for wintertime
customer_reviews.text: I thought the color would be a bit brighter. It is pretty, just a little dark and more for wintertime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean chemical free blush
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of blush for years, as I only use makeup that is free of chemicals and fragrances. I've been buying the "Creation" color, but this time I am trying "Flashy" color. It is lighter and more pink than the photo shows, which to me looks coral and richer, deeper color. It's not coral, and it's not as deep of color. It's light soft pink, but it looks good on my skin, which has warm medium fair tones. It looks natural and I don't have to layer as much as I did with the Creation color to give my cheeks a natural healthy pinkish hue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural and healthy looking.
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup! Very soft looking and not sparkly which is exactly what I was looking for. Small amt but goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Borgert

customer_reviews.title: Great blush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my Clinique blush that I have been using forever. This has only non-harmful ingredients. Goes on nicely and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: momof2cuties

customer_reviews.title: Great Blush
customer_reviews.text: I had this blush for a month now and I really like it. Nice texture, great color and finish. I think Mineral Fusion is one of my favorite make up brands now. The only complain I have is that the product is tiny. Smaller than I thought, but that was my mistake for not checking the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth, nice color....natural...will definitely buy again! I bought this in 2 colors and I love it. This is small, but it's the full size. I bought the same exact thing in a natural foods store and returned it after I found it here for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Used a tiny bit for pictures on my wedding day
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can trust the ingredients and the process in which it's made. It's a lovely shade and applies well. I recommend it, though I've only used it once since I very rarely wear makeup.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieJoy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I am extremely pale and I feel so washed out all the time. A light stroke of this on my cheeks gave me the pop of color that I needed! If you’re very pale like me, use a light hand. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Blush & me don’t do well together. Either is looks like clown makeup or it barley shows up. This is perfect! Yes , it’s small but it will last a long time. I was highly skeptical but I would buy this again & again!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Great natural looking color
customer_reviews.text: Great natural looking color! I have light skin with an olive undertone, this color is great for the winter and spring months when the tan has faded.
customer_reviews.author: sarah Wenbourne

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: My go-to blush. Well worth the price as a little goes a long way, making it last a very long time. And it doesn't make me break out like some of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: L. Manchego

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several Mineral Fusion products now, everyone keeps impressing me. This one is great, love the color on my cheeks! And LOVEEEE that it's EWG verified!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Good blush. I got the pale... I can layer on for as much glow as I want. Good feel. Love Mineral Fusion!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelbel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny container but you don’t need much so I suspect this will last a while. Love the look of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate V

customer_reviews.title: Great, non-toxic blush!
customer_reviews.text: Non-toxic makeup that works great! Glad I found this brand. So tired of cosmetic companies using bad products.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Flashy was really nice. I like how it looked on my skin(light skin with blue undertones). Went on smooth and blended well.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite blush of all time!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using and appreciating Mineral Fusion blushes for over ten years. Don't know why I'd ever change brands.
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, good quality, it lasts for the whole day!
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Love this blush
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush! Color is great, and it doesn't irritate my skin. I like knowing it's one of the "cleaner" makeups out there. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. It is wonderful. Very light and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniemom

customer_reviews.title: Mineral Fusion Blush is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It looks great on my skin and it lasts forever before needing to replace. This is my second purchase of this blush.
customer_reviews.author: C. Paden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, a bit dark. So I mix with other color that is too light. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Schimpf

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. It's not a bright, flahy pink, which is exactly what I wanted. Good choice if you're looking for something more natural
customer_reviews.author: Rhi M

customer_reviews.title: Love this blush!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've loved every Mineral Fusion product I've tried. The blush has a soft look (nothing harsh) and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Becker

customer_reviews.title: Provides a nice effect.
customer_reviews.text: Provides a very nice effect. A little goes a long way, so use sparingly. Pro
customer_reviews.author: Long Island consumer

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the fact that this blush doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the fact that this blush doesn't irritate my dry, sensitive skin. However, I feel like it takes a lot of layering to get the color to show up on the face. I'm not sure if I would spend this much on such a small compact again, but the color is cute and I like the fact that it's hypoallergenic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased creation. A little goes a long way. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased creation. A little goes a long way. I have very pale skin and "pale" had too much shimmer for me. Once applied with a light touch, it looks so natural.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blush as a great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect blush as a great price. It not only wears all day, the container itself lasts for a long time. I typically buy one per year.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy ReeseS

customer_reviews.title: Nice subtle color for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Provides a light shade of color, but can be applied in layers for more drastic color. I have sensitive skin and this has not broken me out. It also doesn't itch the way most powders do on me.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY

customer_reviews.title: skin care
customer_reviews.text: mineral fusion is my go to makeup, it wears well
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color for summer
customer_reviews.text: I love this color -- its perfect for summer and a fabulous match for me -- I have neutral skin with gold undertones. If you are NW20-NC20 in MAC, you must try this for the summer :)
customer_reviews.author: KasiaMG1983

customer_reviews.title: Nice color.
customer_reviews.text: Put on lightly. A little goes a long way. Nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: rosey color: purple hue of red versus pink hue
customer_reviews.text: beautiful rosey color, more on the purple hue of red than pink hue. I have pink toned, fair skin and this is very pretty with light application during the day and just a bit heavier at night.
customer_reviews.author: Gisele L.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous blush!
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect for my face. You hardly need any of this product to make it work and last all day on your face.
customer_reviews.author: RedCin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Was really surprised at how small this is. It's not much bigger than a quarter. Doesn't last all day. Nice color but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: schjdh

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The only blush that I am currently using. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect PURE blush powder!! Thankful Mineral Fusion is available on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years and just love the color. Lasts all day which is saying a lot for natural makeup!
customer_reviews.author: michael p montefusco

customer_reviews.title: A perfect blush
customer_reviews.text: This blush is nice and smooth. It lasts all day. It shows no wrinkles. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Rubiano

customer_reviews.title: Toxic free and beautiful tones!
customer_reviews.text: This powder has such beautiful tones! My husband, who never notices my makeup, complimented me on it. And the best part is that it is toxin free!
customer_reviews.author: SteffieG

customer_reviews.title: Yay for no red dye!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find blush when you are allergic to red dye. No allergy to this and it looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be of good quality, but after paying $20+ for it, I at least expected it to come with an applicator brush. Won't buy again. Love, love the color, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Great blush
customer_reviews.text: I love Mineral Fusion blush, this color works well for my skin tone. It applies well, stays on and has a little shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: LJ in Mpls

customer_reviews.title: It's fine as blush goes
customer_reviews.text: It's fine as blush goes, but too dark for fair skin. It seems darker than depicted. I have to use only a little and then blend it out to avoid looking clownish.
customer_reviews.author: JazzPawzzz

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have three words to say about this product. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The most natural glow possible
customer_reviews.text: Natural glow with a nude and natural finish. Very light application. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tahira Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, easy to apply, and looks very natural and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dr sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color. Can deepen color with more application
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color. Can deepen color with more application, or keep light. Beautiful pink without being harsh.
customer_reviews.author: RedSpice

customer_reviews.title: Color in picture was not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This blush in the color Airy was much browner than shown. It did go on nice when I used it for blush and eyeshadow however the color was just wrong for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous cheeks!
customer_reviews.text: This blush is so pretty and goes on smooth and even.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Way to small for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great colour but not worth the price it’s a sample size and it doesn’t say that it is. Here is a picture of it with a normal size one and a quarter. Real small.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great consistency, goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love how it goes on,love the color, very happy, will order sgain
customer_reviews.author: Fall12

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny and compact, stingy on size
customer_reviews.text: Like the color, very tiny so doesn't seem will last very long. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This color is perfect for my skin tone- do they make a lip color that matches? Would buy it
customer_reviews.author: MDenvir

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The color is beautiful and it looks great on!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmers88

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that the ingredients in this blush are "clean" and not filled with junk.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice (but tiny)
customer_reviews.text: This is a tiny amount for the price, but the product is good. I don't know if I would re-purchase due to the cost/value
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Love Mineral Fusion products so far
customer_reviews.text: Use the Mineral Fusion foundation powder as well. I really like the blush. Color is natural and it stays fresh all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice product
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smoothly, the color is natural looking, and the container lasts quite a while. I've used this brand for several years and find it really livens up my face.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Deur

customer_reviews.title: Soft and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this skin care line. It is the same price on amazon as at Whole Foods in Massachusetts, but I get it delivered to my door! Last a long time and does not come off in the middle of the day! Natural and without nasty chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: JessLyne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Applies very easily and I will buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: JulieR

customer_reviews.title: Great natural blush - wish it held applicator brush.
customer_reviews.text: Great blush - love that it is natural - light, clean. I just wish it had a place to hold the applicator brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this blush!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and I love the way it goes on. It's silky and a little goes a long way with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything by mineral fusion and this blush was not a disappointment! Solid company!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice blush
customer_reviews.text: This goes on really nicely and seems to last pretty well. The nice thing is that this one container lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Rosy cheeks
customer_reviews.text: Love this color and a little goes a long ways.
customer_reviews.author: Deb T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Blush
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it looks great and last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mayer-Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Blush
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and ease of application. It is very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kakesalina

customer_reviews.title: good color - product size a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Great color - bit smaller then I expected but very nice overall.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Pale is too shimmery, Flashy is just right
customer_reviews.text: I liked this blush, but there is a good amount of shimmer in the Pale color, which I am not a fan of - especially for summer when my skin is already a bit shiny from the Southern humidity. I ordered Flashy and like it much better. Not as subtle in color as Pale, but I just apply it more lightly. I may return to Pale in the fall/winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Blush
customer_reviews.text: This blush is terrific. I have very sensitive skin & this does not irritate my skin. Another good thing is that it's gluten free. The color blends in nicely, has a wonderful glow & stays on all day. I will definitely buy more of this product. My two favorite colors are Flashy (nice soft coral) and Trace (a really cool pink). Thanks Amazon for carrying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I love that its light and goes on very easy, it also stays on all day. Gluten free is a nice touch for me as well! I will buy again, much better than the other bare mineral products.
customer_reviews.author: MaryM2010

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the Mineral Fusion brand... no bad chemicals... and this is my favorite, low-key blush color.
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: natural makeup
customer_reviews.text: I use several of mineral fusion products. Love that they are all natural. This blush shows up, stays on, without being over much.
customer_reviews.author: melwoo79

customer_reviews.title: Great... till I learned creme blush was no longer extinct!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, I had resigned myself to the fact that no one still made creme blush, and I purchased the Mineral Fusion. It was nice, for powder blush, but I have never fully adjusted from using creme blush (aka ROUGE), then was happy to discover I could purchase it through Amazon, and I just posted a review on Vasanti Luminous Cream Blush. So, if you love powder blush, you will probably love this. I just happen to be 'an old-fashioned girl' about my makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Zuehl

customer_reviews.title: too small compact
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok product but it is very small and I have difficulty using my makeup brushes with it. Hope you will enlarge the product so I might buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Susan Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like Mineral Fusion products because they are gluten free and I like the color of this blush...
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, buildable, wears well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blush! I bought the color smashing and it sort of reminds me of Bobbi Brown’s pale pink. Obviously BB’s is a unique color but this is a cleaner alternative. It applies well, wears well, and it gives me a natural healthy glow. For reference, I’m medium skin tone. But it’s buildable so it might be suitable for lighter tones. I’m very happy with it and I also own the color Flashy. Also very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: I like this product and i love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and i love this brand. i was hesitant to pick this color but it looked so pretty in the pictures. i have fair/cool skin and i think it was a little too "red" for me as i like a pale pink blush but i gave it a try. i will try another color but i still like the product
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a matte blush. This is the first blush I own and found it to be really nice. Tap to remove any excess from brush as a little goes a long way. I am Latina and medium skin tone. Flashy was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: YAN

customer_reviews.title: Non-toxic but goes on a little bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this very expensive make-up because it is made responsibly and with things that are non-toxic. I will keep using it because there are not a lot of other great options, but it really doesn't look as natural as I would like my make-up to look. It looks like you are wearing somewhat heavy make-up even when you just put a little bit on and it doesn't last the entire day. So I gave it four stars since I do really like that it is non-toxic and made in a sustainable way and I want to support the company, but there is a little work to be done to make it go on more smoothly and look more natural.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Creation - coral
customer_reviews.text: I express the color of creation as "coral," or if you're usually good with coral-colored blush, you're probably good to try. It might be stronger color on your skin than what you expect, though. This color is great on my skin color and I like the fact that it's a less-harmful product. I don't have any complains.
customer_reviews.author: M. K.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pigmented as I thought
customer_reviews.text: From the vibrant color of the Smashing blush in the pictures, I thought it would be very pigmented so I could do a bold, bright blush look like you see on the Instagram girls. It's really not very pigmented at all. I have to repeatedly swipe with my makeup brush and do several layers before it starts to look like anything. Also the compact is a little on the small side. Still, nice natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: great blush!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Mineral fusion blush for a while now and I love it! This was the first time I bought one on Amazon however and I thought I was buying the same color I normally buy ( which I figured out is Pale, not Airy) so it was darker and more pink than I expected but that was my own fault. I think it wears beautifully for quite a while, but fades a bit after probably 6 hours. I don't expect more than that out of my makeup however so I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and blends nicely
customer_reviews.text: I love mineral makeup, it is not only good for your skin, it makes your skin healthy looking after application. I choose creation, creation, a light-med rose color blush. Although this blush is everything I'd want in mineral makeup, the color was a little dark for me (that is). I will have to check if mineral fusion offers a lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: The color is nice if you have 'yellow toned' skin
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice, the product seems ok- I have only applied it once and so far so good. But the packaging on this product and the case pop up top is bad. It comes WAY over packaged and for someone with large fingers and short nails, it is hard to open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Great staying power.
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth and read many reviews for non toxic blush. I finally settled on this one but didn't know how it would turn out. Lets just say I was pleasantly surprised! This blush is amazing! It goes on wonderfully and has staying power. I admit it is even better than my normal non toxic blush that got discontinued after I had used it for years. I will be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mallissa Evans

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think and a different color than show.
customer_reviews.text: It's snaller than you might think and the color is not as pictured. It's more of a pink than purple as it appears. I was pretty excited about purple blush but I will have to look elsewhere. It's still a favotire brand of mine an good quality but it's more like a small eye shadow pallet than blush.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wiggins

product_meta.title: Mineral Fusion Makeup Blush Creation, 0.10 oz
product_meta.description: Color:CreationblushChoose a shade to contour, brighten, and highlight your cheekbones.Apply this highly pigmented blush gently to cheek area using the blush brush. Enriched with antioxidants to wrap your face in protection.IngredientsMica, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Gluconolactone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Laminaria Ochroleuca Extract, Butylene Glycol, Aspalathus Linearis Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum Seed Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate, May Contain (+/-): Iron Oxides ( CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Carmine (CI 74570), Manganese Violet (CI 77742)
feature_bullets: CREATION MATTE ROSE: Boasting sassy hues of instant radiance, Mineral Fusion Blush enhances your natural flush factor with a luxurious blend of skin-defenders. Dust onto the apples of your cheek for an instant pop of color.
NATURAL FORMULA: Pomegranate, White Tea, and Red Tea pack an antioxidant punch; Sea Kelp helps lock in hydration; and Vitamins C & E help your skin look its best at any age.

SMARTER MAKEUP: Improve your complexion & nourish your skin with our line of lip tints, eyeshadows, brushes, foundations, nail polishes, mascaras, primers, eyeliners, moisturizers, face creams & cleansers.

NATURAL COSMETICS: We select effective natural ingredients & ensure our products are free of gluten, parabens, talc, artificial colors, synthetic fragrances, SLS & phthalates. We NEVER conduct animal testing.
HEALTHY BEAUTY: Mineral Fusion offers a wide range of nail polish, hair care, body care & skin care - each formulated to deliver the uniquely beneficial power of minerals. Products made in the USA.
